ygData.subject: Re: Studs and Bonding
ygData.msgSnippet: It takes 2 small bricks of ore and 1 flask of water...BUT as someone posted earlier it is MUCH easier and cheaper to BUY the sheets. Each small brick of ore
ygData.messageBody:
It takes 2 small bricks of ore and 1 flask of water...BUT as someone posted
earlier it is MUCH easier and cheaper to BUY the sheets. Each small brick
of ore costs 6g some copper and some silver...so that ends up being at
LEAST 12 gold probably close to 13 and a sheet of metal only cost 1
platinum to buy. But its up to personal choice. ;)

Twilite

At 09:47 AM 6/8/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: "McConnell, Jeff" <Jeff.McConnell@...>
>
>Thank you. You wouldn't happen to know the formula for making metal sheets,
>not the folded sheets but the ones used to make banded. I know it was broken
>but I have seen on a few boards that its now working.
>Silver
>
